blazing.lambda.BlazingStreamFunction

Packages that use BlazingStreamFunction

blazing
 

  • Uses of BlazingStreamFunction in blazing

    Methods in blazing with parameters of type BlazingStreamFunction
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    BlazingResponse.streamFile(String filename, BlazingStreamFunction callback)
    Streams a file to the client for download purposes, the default content type is "application/octet-stream" response.streamFile("Vid.mp4", (outstream, file) -> { try (FileInputStream fileInputStream = new FileInputStream(file)) { byte[] buffer = new byte[4096]; int bytesRead; while ((bytesRead = fileInputStream.read(buffer)) != -1) { outstream.write(buffer, 0, bytesRead); } outstream.flush(); } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) { BlazingLog.severe(ex.getMessage()); } catch (IOException ex) { BlazingLog.severe(ex.getMessage()); } });
    void
    BlazingResponse.streamFile(String filename, String stream_type, BlazingStreamFunction callback)
    Streams a file to the client for download purposes response.streamFile("Archive.zip", "application/zip", (outstream, file) -> { try (FileInputStream fileInputStream = new FileInputStream(file)) { byte[] buffer = new byte[4096]; int bytesRead; while ((bytesRead = fileInputStream.read(buffer)) != -1) { outstream.write(buffer, 0, bytesRead); } outstream.flush(); } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) { BlazingLog.severe(ex.getMessage()); } catch (IOException ex) { BlazingLog.severe(ex.getMessage()); } });
    void
    BlazingResponse.streamSizedFile(String filename, BlazingStreamFunction callback)
    Streams a file with a size that is known upfront.
    void
    BlazingResponse.streamSizedFile(String filename, String stream_type, BlazingStreamFunction callback)
    Streams a file with a size that is known upfront.
